entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Matane
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:22 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -4.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mont-Joli Airport 11:21 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -4.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -6.5°C
Wind: NE 45 km/h gust 56 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow or freezing rain. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets changing to freezing rain this afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill minus 13 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow or freezing rain. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to snow near midnight. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of freezing drizzle. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Light snow changing to periods of freezing drizzle in the morning. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023
